page.title: 06Pencoed Sports Field
page.content: Pencoed Sports Field is in Felindre Road. There is a club house and changing rooms there, the changing rooms being at the bottom of the field inside the pavilion. A cricket club and rugby club use the club house. The sports field is used for rugby, football, cricket and at times ,fetes or carnivals. The field and club house used to be a farm a few years ago. Next to the sports field is the Comprehensive School sports field. There is a rugby pitch, a cricket ground and cricket nets, a football pitch, one hundred metre track, four hundred metre track and a long jump. Pencoed Rugby Club play in cup competitions in the winter, and also play against local teams. In the club house there is a bar, a lounge and a function room.
